leaf,
level_num,

mapper.update:
update sys_perm set
id = #{id},
pid = #{pid},
name = #{name},
type = #{type},
url = #{url},
url_submit = #{urlSubmit},
path = #{path},
leaf = #{leaf},
level_num = #{levelNum},
sort_num = #{sortNum},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_time = #{updateTime},
where id = #{id}

update sys_perm set
id = #{id},
pid = #{pid},
name = #{name},
type = #{type},
url = #{url},
url_submit = #{urlSubmit},
path = #{path},
leaf = #{leaf},
level_num = #{levelNum},
sort_num = #{sortNum},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_time = #{updateTime},
, version = version + 1 where id = #{id}

update.foreach:
update sys_perm set
id = #{ pojo.id },
pid = #{ pojo.pid },
name = #{ pojo.name },
type = #{ pojo.type },
url = #{ pojo.url },
url_submit = #{ pojo.urlSubmit },
path = #{ pojo.path },
leaf = #{ pojo.leaf },
level_num = #{ pojo.levelNum },
sort_num = #{ pojo.sortNum },
create_time = #{ pojo.createTime },
update_time = #{ pojo.updateTime },
where
id = #{ pojo.id }
